forum.name: Remix/Revise OER fact sheet
forum.intro:
Fact sheets are used to communicate key facts and information about a topic quickly. For this assignment you will create a personalized OER Fact Sheet by revising and remixing other OER. Eventually you will share this fact sheet (or a revision of it) as an OER with a Creative Commons license with your students and colleagues to develop their understanding of OER.

For this assignment, you must remix or revise at least one existing fact sheet on OER (sample in Word; sample in OER Commons) and share it online as an OER. Your OER fact sheet should:

  • Be no more than two pages
  • Have an appropriate title
  • Define OER
  • Explain the five Rs of OER
  • Discuss the relevance of OER to adult education or science instruction
  • Be CC BY licensed
  • Use a CC BY logo and credit the source for the remixing
  • Be created as a Word document (to allow for peer editing)

The OER Commons Help Center has answers for questions about getting started and finding content. Please note that there is an approval process, and you will be notified when your OER has been approved.

When you’re done, return to this forum and attach the Word file to your post. Also, tell us about the experience of creating your OER Fact Sheet. What topics were most important to include on your Fact Sheet for your audience?

Review and comment thoughtfully on the fact sheet of at least one other participant. Note any areas where you would revise or remix what other participants have created to improve your fact sheet.
